successes.title: Robotech® RPG Tactics™
successes.description: Robotech® RPG Tactics™ is a fast paced strategy battle game that expands on the popular Palladium role playing game.

Pledges.description: A NEW DAWN: All New Dawn backers receive a Special Edition, Rick Hunter Veritech.

HOMECOMING: Kickstarter exclusive! Two different 17x11 inch prints (16x10 image area), each signed by Robotech RPG game designer and writer Kevin Siembieda. One is the never before seen, full wraparound painting of the original Robotech RPG (1986) cover. The other is the wraparound cover for the RDF Manual (1987). Art by Kevin Long. Suitable for framing.

BATTLE HYMN: Kickstarter exclusive! Five different 8 1/2 x 11 inch Robotech prints (8 x 10 image area) from various Palladium covers from the 1990s, plus signed and numbered Certificate of Authenticity by Kevin Siembieda. Art by various artists. Suitable for framing.
BOOBYTRAP - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: All Boobytrap backers receive everything in FIRST CONTACT at a special early bird price!
FIRST CONTACT: All First Contact backers receive a copy of the Robotech® RPG Tactics™ boxed game.

BLITZKRIEG - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL:
All Blitzkrieg backers receive everything in BATTLE CRY at a special early bird price!

BATTLE CRY:  All Battle Cry backers receive the Robotech® RPG Tactics™ Boxed Game, Rick Hunter SE Veritech, +2 Battle Pod Frames (6 Battle Pods total), +2 Valkyrie Frames (6 Poses - 2 Fighters total), Special Edition Art Print
SHOWDOWN: Showdown backers receive x2 of all BATTLE CRY contents. Including any unlocked rewards.
RECKLESS:  Reckless backers receive x4 of all BATTLE CRY contents. Including any unlocked BONUS rewards.
BURSTING POINT - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL:  Bursting Point backers receive everything in GLOVAL'S REPORT at a special early bird price!

GLOVAL'S REPORT:  Gloval's Report backers receive a studio painted copy of the Robotech® RPG Tactics™ boxed game and Rick Hunter SE Veritech. They also receive all the contents and rewards from the Battle Cry pledge levels. Painted copy will ship after other rewards.

SDF-1 MEGA PLEDGE: 1x Robotech RPG Tactics Boxed Game,10x UEDF Decal Sheets, 1x Rick Hunter Valkyrie, 1x Roy Fokker Valkyrie, 264x Veritech Valkyries (VF-1A,1J,1S,1R), 60x VEF-1 Valkyries, 12x VF-1D Valkyries, 12x Super Valkyries (All Valkyries include Fighter, Guardian, and Battloid modes.), 12x Armored Battloids,120x QF-3000 Ghost Drone Fighters, 60x SF-3A Lancer II, 66x Tomahawks,  66x Spartans, 60x Defenders, 60x Phalanxes, 12x Monsters. The SDF-1 pledge does NOT include any future unlocked Experimental Mecha or Bonuses unless specified otherwise.

THUVERL-SALAN DESTROYER MEGA PLEDGE: 1x Robotech RPG Tactics Boxed Game, 10x Zentraedi Decal Sheets, 1x Khyron Glaug, 1x Miriya Queadluun-Rau, 600x Regult Battlepods,  38x Glaug Officer's Battlepods,12x Glaug-Eldare, 90x Serauhaug-Regults, 90x Gluuhaug-Regults, 38x Quel-Regult, 38x Quel-Gulnau, 180x Gnerl Fighters, 96x Nousjadeul-Ger Power Armor, 96x Queadluun-Rau Power Armor, 144x Serau-Ger Heavy Infantry, 144x Gluu-Ger Light Infantry.  The Thuveral-Salan Destroyer Pledge does NOT include any unlocked Experimental Mecha or Bonuses unless specified otherwise.
